_source.short_desc: Multi-Vendor is a marketplace builder that allows for creating a marketplace. This is an on-premise award-winning marketplace software.
_source.long_desc:
CS-Cart Multi-Vendor is a standalone eCommerce marketplace platform that allows you to create a marketplace. In Multi-Vendor, independent vendors can sell their products through a single storefront using built-in CMS for marketplaces.

Over 1,600 multivendor marketplaces worldwide use this CMS for a marketplace and you can find more live marketplaces based on CS-Cart than on any other marketplace software.
_source.target_audience: Entrepreneur who's opening an e-commerce marketplace from scratch or expanding his (her) business.

related_products.short_desc: The end-to-end ecommerce platform for companies who sell digital solutions to local businesses.
related_products.features:
With Vendasta, you can find new products across all categories from our ever-growing Marketplace, sell your own, and deliver them all from one branded app.

The platform provides partners with everything needed to market, sell, bill, and fulfill digital solutions to local businesses all under one login. Partners receive access to rebrandable business apps for delivery to clients.

related_products.short_desc: Buy and sell tool which can be customized to Auction, Reverse Auction, Penny Auction, Silent Auction.
related_products.features: Buy and sell tools which can be customized to Auction, Reverse Auction, Penny Auction and Silent Auction. We are suited for individual business entrepreneurs , family business , multi million corporates and government entities to deploy auction,  buy it now , reverse , penny and silent online marketplaces. Our Software runs on Cloud & Dedicated Servers, also works well with 50+ payment gateways including Paypal, Authorize.net, Braintree payment, Balanced payment & Adaptive payments.

related_products.short_desc: Our software contains multiple Amazon seller tools to help you find high ranking keywords, identify trends, spy on competitors, & more.
related_products.features: Helium 10 is an eCommerce solution designed to help Amazon sellers visualize key metrics such as seasonal trends and profit estimates to analyze products' success rate. The system offers keyword research tools, which enable digital marketers to identify high-ranking keywords to streamline ad campaigns on a unified interface. Key features of the platform include profitability calculator, ASIN grabber, inventory protector, index checker, multi-user login, and more among others.

related_products.short_desc: The leading all-in-one platform for selling on Amazon.
related_products.features:
Jungle Scout is the leading all-in-one platform for selling on Amazon. Jungle Scout's powerful, data-driven technology helps entrepreneurs and brands build successful businesses on Amazon through product research, market intelligence, brand and listing management capabilities, and more. Since 2015, we've helped over 500,000 customers.

With Jungle Scout, you can:
*Perform product & keyword research
*Find suppliers 
*Create product listings
*Manage inventory & finances
*Automate review requests

related_products.short_desc: Algolia is the leading search & discovery API for websites and mobile apps. Easy to implement and dev-focused.
related_products.features:
Algolia is an API platform for dynamic experiences that helps businesses maximize the speed of search and discovery, while solving the pain of relevance tuning through AI.

Algolia Search is a powerful, fully hosted API that delivers content to users in milliseconds. Devs can customize the relevance of their UX and get insights on how users interact with it.

Algolia Recommend is a robust API that allows you to build unique product recommendations into any digital e-commerce experience.

related_products.short_desc: Sharetribe is the fast and easy way to create an online marketplace, where users can rent or sell goods, spaces or services.
related_products.features: Sharetribe is easiest way to start your own online marketplace. Create a platform where your users can rent or sell goods, spaces or services online. Get started in less than a minute and launch yours today. No downloads, no installations, and all without the help of a developer. Sharetribe handles all the hosting, transactions and online payments. It is easy to use and simple to customize. Sharetribe takes care of the tech, you take care of business.

related_products.short_desc: Elastic Enterprise Search (Previously known as Swiftype) is Elasticsearch, with a complete set of specialized tools and extensible APIs
related_products.features: Elastic Enterprise Search (Previously known as Swiftype) is Elasticsearch, with a complete set of specialized tools and extensible APIs that make it easy to build search solutions and give users the best answers, every time. Monitor performance with robust analytics, tweak relevance in real-time, and scale it all seamlessly.

related_products.short_desc: Yo!Kart is a leading multivendor marketplace software that has powered 2000+ scalable B2C, B2B, P2P marketplaces globally.
related_products.features:
Yo!Kart is a leading marketplace software developed with key eCommerce features in-built. The scalable software comes with multiple business APIs pre-integrated along with 20+ payment gateways. It is suitable for businesses of all sizes and offers the support of an in-house Agile team for end-to-end customizations. 2000+ global clients have launched contemporary marketplaces with Yo!Kart.

Yo!Kart packages start from $999 which includes a lifetime license and source code ownership.

related_products.short_desc: Yelo is a one-stop solution to create your Hyperlocal marketplace like Ubereats, Instacart, etc. within 24 Hours
related_products.features:
Yelo is a multi-vendor marketplace SAAS software solution for Hyperlocal businesses. Yelo provides the local entrepreneurs with a complete tech suite to run and automate their business operations: from ordering, delivery to marketing automation. 
With 50+ integrations in payments, marketing and accounting make Yelo, the most powerful multi-vendor marketplace software.

Linnworks connects, manages and automates commerce operations, powering businesses to sell wherever their customers are and capture every revenue opportunity. With more than 100 integrations, Linnworks enables businesses to manage their multichannel inventory, orders and fulfillment from a centralized platform and provides deep insights for business planning and growth. As both Amazon and eBay's largest European commerce partner, Linnworks processes $8bn+ GMV each year globally.

similar_products.short_desc: Fully hosted solution that enables businesses to build marketplaces for products, services, events, and bookings.
similar_products.features: Marketplacer makes it easier for entrepreneurs and businesses to begin and scale their marketplace vision. It is a global platform which brings the capability to create all types of marketplaces including platforms for products, services, events, booking and digital downloads.

similar_products.short_desc: Easy to use marketplace software. Choose your feature sets, design templates, simple payment options and more.
similar_products.features: We are a marketplace builder software company that provides an easy to build marketplace platform, as well as access to our in-house development team and marketplace experts with the ability to create any type of marketplace imaginable.

similar_products.short_desc: Nautical is the complete multi-vendor marketplace platform that gets your marketplace up and running in days.
similar_products.features: Nautical is the complete multi-vendor marketplace platform helping retailers, brands, and B2B companies quickly launch and scale online marketplaces. Whether you need a full stack marketplace or want to leverage Nautical's marketplace backend on top of your existing ecommerce system, Nautical has tools for you. Its goal is to enable businesses to build thriving marketplaces by making operating a marketplace simple. To learn more, visit www.nauticalcommerce.com.

similar_products.short_desc: Multi-vendor e-commerce marketplace platform for product, service or booking marketplaces for enterprises, SME's and startups.
similar_products.features:
Ecommerce marketplace platform for product, service or booking marketplaces for enterprises, SME's and startups.

Omnyfy is a multi-vendor Marketplace Platform delivered as a Platform as a Service (PaaS) offering. Omnyfy can save your business tens of thousands of dollars and reduce go-to-market time-frames by over 70% compared to a custom marketplace build. 

Trusted by major enterprises and successful startups, Omnyfy is the ideal foundation on which to build your marketplace vision.

similar_products.short_desc: Flexible and fast to launch, get a powerful multi-vendor accommodation and tours marketplace that is personalized to you.
similar_products.features:
Tashi is the #1 Travel Marketplace platform. 

Flexible and fast to launch, get a powerful multi-vendor accommodation and tours marketplace that is personalized to you.

Let travellers book accommodation, tours and activities with your partners. 

Your extranet is powered by our booking software so you can streamline your supplier management.

Put your guests in control of their trips, with a self-serve portal and P2P messaging.

You get everything you need to launch - and grow.

similar_products.short_desc: Flexibility is Power with Arcadier. It's the highest and most flexible starting point for building any B2B or B2C marketplace.
similar_products.features: Arcadier is the world's most powerful SaaS marketplace platform. It offers unmatched built-in functionality and stability with over 500,000 man hours in development over 10-years. Customers enjoy highly refined UX covering tens of thousands of transactional variables (in a true "multi-vendor" marketplace) with access to hundreds of APIs. It's a high and flexible starting-point for B2B or B2C Enterprises and we customise and integrate solutions for our customers to drive competitive advantage.

similar_products.short_desc: Teikametrics helps sellers grow their businesses on Amazon & Walmart through data, AI-powered technology, & marketplace expertise.
similar_products.features:
Teikametrics helps sellers & brand owners grow their businesses on Amazon and Walmart.com through the combination of data, AI-powered technology, & marketplace expertise.

Teikametrics Flywheel, the first Marketplace Optimization Platform, connects & optimizes critical ecommerce business operations including advertising, inventory, & market intelligence - all in one place. Teikametrics unrivaled data access, scale, & AI technology optimizes over $7B in Amazon & Walmart.com sales annually.

similar_products.short_desc: Marketplace solution that helps businesses build white-labeled online stores, track orders and manage delivery networks.
similar_products.features:
Your brand. Your business. Grow with Redbox, a powerful online ordering and delivery platform which supports many models.

Online Marketplaces:
With Redbox you can easily pull together an online marketplace of many hand picked outlets.

Branded E-Commerce:
Redbox can also be used to power an app just for your brand.

It's not just about food:
Redbox is here to power whatever you need to deliver. Integrations into delivery networks and dispatch systems allow your products to get moving!

similar_products.short_desc: Yo!Kart is a leading multivendor marketplace software that has powered 2000+ scalable B2C, B2B, P2P marketplaces globally.
similar_products.features:
Yo!Kart is a leading marketplace software developed with key eCommerce features in-built. The scalable software comes with multiple business APIs pre-integrated along with 20+ payment gateways. It is suitable for businesses of all sizes and offers the support of an in-house Agile team for end-to-end customizations. 2000+ global clients have launched contemporary marketplaces with Yo!Kart.

Yo!Kart packages start from $999 which includes a lifetime license and source code ownership.

similar_products.short_desc: Shuup is a flexible, powerful ecommerce SaaS platform. Shuup's Single and Multi-vendor licenses are built for any business to empower v
similar_products.features: A true marketplace solution built for any business that would like to enable vendors to sell services, subscriptions, streaming media or physical products from an online Marketplace. Shuup enables two-sided or single-vendor marketplaces for all B2B, B2C, and P2P use cases. Shuup's variety of features include inventory management, marketing and coupon campaigns, vendor subscription and commission plans, shipping provider and payment gateway integrations, intuitive page editor ... and more.

similar_products.short_desc: ShelfTrend is used to benchmark competitors, monitor pricing & search rank, identify & assess products, and watch new listings on eBay.
similar_products.features:
ShelfTrend is a web-based tool used by businesses that sell on eBay to benchmark competitors, monitor pricing and search rank, identify and assess products, and to identify new threats to their sales.

ShelfTrend provides a suite of pre-formatted reports and charts to make it quick to get the desired insights. ShelfTrend uses real-time eBay data, and provides reports for all of eBay's marketplaces.

similar_products.short_desc: Yelo is a one-stop solution to create your Hyperlocal marketplace like Ubereats, Instacart, etc. within 24 Hours
similar_products.features:
Yelo is a multi-vendor marketplace SAAS software solution for Hyperlocal businesses. Yelo provides the local entrepreneurs with a complete tech suite to run and automate their business operations: from ordering, delivery to marketing automation. 
With 50+ integrations in payments, marketing and accounting make Yelo, the most powerful multi-vendor marketplace software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top eCommerce software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of eCommerce tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: eCommerce software enables businesses to conduct transactions for goods and services wholly or partially over the Internet. Typical features for eCommerce applications include: online shopping carts, flexible product category structure and search, customer account and login tools, automatic customer notifications, tax administration, order tracking and print catalog support. eCommerce solutions often provide integration tools for call center support, inventory control, customer relationship management, and payment processing. eCommerce software is related to Order Entry software and Order Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Multi-Channel eCommerce software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Multi-Channel eCommerce tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Multi-Channel eCommerce software enables businesses to sell and promote products across various sales channels including online marketplaces and social media. It synchronizes all inventory and product data to manage all sales channels centrally.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Small Business eCommerce software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Small Business eCommerce tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Small Business eCommerce software enables small businesses and freelancers to build their own online store with all the features for selling and promoting products online.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Vendor Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Vendor Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Vendor Management software helps manage costs, track progress, and report on relationship and product quality of third-party vendors. When an organization uses multiple vendors, Vendor Management software can enhance productivity and collaboration of the vendor projects. This type of software often includes information databasing, vendor scoring, RFP and bidding functionality, and performance tracking. Vendor Management software is related to Contract Management software, Proposal Management software, Procurement software, and Purchasing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Website Builder software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Website Builder tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Website Builder software makes it possible to quickly create your own website with design tools, templates, domain hosting, and coding options. They may also include widgets for social networking integrations, credit card processing, and multimedia. Several of these applications also include built-in SEO tools to help your website perform better in searches. Some related applications can be found in the Content Management software and Landing Page software categories.
